metadata.title: CVE-2020-16032 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient data validation in sharing in Google Chrome prior to87.0.4280.66 allowed a remote attacker to spoof the contents of the Omnibox(URL bar) via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
